Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone

Since some time I miss a useful vessel to bring more as some Kerbals to a moon. Landers are nice but only for Kerbals and not mobile. And to land on the same point twice without strafing is really difficult. But my plan was to build a Station and today I like to play with Kethane. And maybe we can collect some artefacts in the furture.

My answer for this goal is the Lunor-Series.

available on Kerbal Spaceport:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/its_lunor_series/

Is this STOCK?

I only use the "Spacejunk Cargobay" and the Stock-equivalent fueltanks from "KW Rocketry". The TAC Fuelbalancer is a must have to balance the Lunor. But this is no cheat, fuelbalancing is a standardprocedure in every aircraft with more than 1 tank. All other are stock in the download-version. Feel free to equip this vessel unique for your Mission.

I hope I become here more feedback for future versions of the Lunor.
